casebody.data:
CANTLIN
v.
SMYTHE CRAMER CO. 2018-1841 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motions for admission pro hac vice of Jennifer M. Keas and Jay N. Varon. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
